report.title: Species Data
report.description: Report used to retrieve details of a species excluding custom attributes for the species details form. Includes default common name and external key.
report.query: select distinct tall.id, tall.taxon_meaning_id, tall.external_key, tall.default_common_name, tall.taxon as taxon_plain, case tall.language_iso when 'lat' then '' || tall.taxon || '' || coalesce(' ' || tall.authority, '') else tall.taxon end, tall.language_iso, tall.language_iso='lat' as latin, tall.preferred from cache_taxa_taxon_lists t join cache_taxa_taxon_lists tall on tall.taxon_meaning_id=t.taxon_meaning_id where 1=1

order_bys.order_by: tall.preferred desc, tall.language_iso='lat' desc, tall.language_iso desc, tall.id asc

param.name: taxa_taxon_list_id
param.description: Taxa_taxon_list_id of the taxon to load

param.name: taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Taxon meaning ID of the taxon to load. Provide this OR the taxa taxon list ID OR the external key.

param.name: external_key
param.description: Taxon meaning ID of the taxon to load. Provide this (tvk) OR the taxa taxon list ID OR the taxon meaning ID.
